title: Website Relaunch: Budget Overrun
assumptions: Current scope cannot be delivered within budget.
Client will not delay launch date.
Board approval for budget increase is uncertain.
alternatives: Extend timeline (delay launch, adjust marketing campaign)
risks: Client dissatisfaction if features are removed
Quality degradation if developed under time pressure
Deadline slippage if timeline is extended
nextSteps: Document scope changes in decision log
clientContext: Mid-size manufacturing company relaunching corporate site.
commsContext: Weekly steering call; client expects transparency.
clientImplications: Scope reduction impacts feature set; budget increase impacts approval.
goal: Align scope with budget while maintaining delivery quality.
